title: Pink Stripe Cute Dog Slippers for Women Men, Fuzzy Warm House Shoes, Soft Winter Bedroom Slippers Non-Slip Indoor Home Slippers Travel Slippers
features: MATERIAL: The slippers are made of high-quality soft polyester fabric, which is light, wear-resistant, and very comfortable to wear.

SIZE: We offer 2 sizes, M fits women 6-8.5/men 6-8, and L fits women 9-11.5/men 8-11. Please check the size chart in the picture, we provide the inner length and foot length data for you to choose from, you can choose the best size without any problem.

SOFT WARM SLIPPERS: The slippers is lightweight and durable. Provides cushioning and support for feet for all-day comfort. Withstands wet and cold floors. Keep your feet warm in the cold winter months.
OCCASION: These women's and men's slippers are perfect to wear indoors, in bedrooms, at home, in hotels, and in offices. Easy to clean, easy to carry, and a must-have for business and travel.

PERFECT GIFT: A pair of warm and cozy home slippers, great gifts for your wife mom daughter and loved ones to express your Birthday, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Anniversary, Thanksgiving, Christmas & New Year warmest greetings.
description: Warm Comfortable Slippers for Women and Men Features
1. This is a comfortable slipper, made of polyester fabric that wraps your feet well and provides comfort.
2. These slippers are printed with cute and beautiful patterns for a fashionable look. Perfect for everyday wear, it can be paired with your loungewear.
3. The textured bottom of the shoe grips the floor and prevents you from sliding or slipping.
4. Washing instructions: It is recommended to hand wash, dry naturally, do not bleach.
